Ayurvedic Internship Retreat in Ubud, Bali

Hands-On Training for Ayurvedic Health Counselor and Practitioner Students

The program provides a hands-on and immersive Ayurvedic experience, focusing on client-to-client interaction and thorough diagnostics.

Internship Retreat

The program provides a hands-on and immersive Ayurvedic experience, focusing on client-to-client interaction and thorough diagnostics. Participants delve into the intricacies of Ayurveda, gaining insights into system-wise examinations and herbal applications. Holistic approaches, including Dinacharya, Yoga, and expert talks, enrich the learning experience. The structured schedule covers advanced Ayurvedic therapies, Ayurvedic cooking, and enlightening visits to botanical gardens. Tailored for aspiring Ayurvedic Health Counselors and Practitioners, this preceptorship blends theoretical knowledge and practical skills for a transformative journey in Ayurvedic healthcare.

Your Teacher

Discover the essence of Ayurveda with Dr. Resmi V. Rajagopal, an Ayurveda Physician from Kerala, India. With roots deeply embedded in Ayurvedic heritage, my journey began in 2007, earning degrees from esteemed institutions like Pankajakasthuri Ayurveda Medical College and ITRA Jamnagar. As a teacher and practitioner, my expertise extends beyond textbooks, incorporating practical wisdom and spiritual insights into health and wellness. Having shaped the future of Ayurveda as an assistant professor at SDM College of Ayurveda, I invite you to delve into the heart of Ayurveda.
